The group is launching an independent spending effort to convince Mike Pence to run, The group,`` America's President Committee,'' begins a website, www.theconservativechampion.org, and a signature drive Monday. Mike Pence has gotten buzz on the right in part because he's seen as a candidate who could unify the three traditional constituencies within the GOP- social conservatives, economic conservatives and foreign-policy conservatives, the news service states.

Microsoft said Monday that it would release an update of its Windows Phone operating system later this year that will provide a full web experience to smartphone users. We need to give people the full web, the full Internet on their phone, like they've come to expect with the PC, Microsoft chief Steve Ballmer said at the mobile industry's annual get-together in Barcelona.`` Later this year we are going to release a version of Internet Explorer9( web browser) complete with hardware and graphics and

BGC Partners analyst Colin Gillis said that Google experienced tremendous growth under Eric Schmidt , becoming a search and advertising powerhouse, although the company also arguably experienced a number of missteps and missed opportunities. A case can also be made that the company has not built any new material revenue streams, was late to building for the mobile market, has no effective social solutions, overbuilt its headcount and placed itself in the crosshairs of government regulators, Gillis said. Editor-in-chief of technology blog SearchEngineLand.com Danny Sullivan said Google's biggest challenges now are to`` prove that they've got their Mojo back and that nobody needs to fear them.''

friend of Democratic congresswoman Gabrielle Giffords , has visited the lawmaker in her hospital room and is in close contact with her astronaut husband Mark Kelly, she told NBC's`` Meet The Press.'' Gabrielle Giffords is making progress every day. She's using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing, Kirsten Gillibrand said.`` It's an extraordinary amount of progress for a woman who sustained such a horrific injury,'' she added.
